Branch of Poland-Korea Association formed
articles.content:
Branch of Poland-Korea Association formed 
    Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Opatuw branch of the Poland-Korea Association was inaugurated on May 11 with due ceremony.
 An action program of the branch was announced at the ceremony.    
 The chief of the branch said that the branch would intensify propaganda about Korea and invigorate the solidarity activities for expanding and developing the friendly and cooperative relations with the Korean people.

Kim Yong Nam greets Yemeni President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam greets Yemeni President 
    Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly yesterday sent a message of greetings to Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the Reunification and Foundation of the Republic of Yemen.
 The message sincerely wished the President and people of Yemen greater success in their work for achieving social stability and economic prosperity of the country.

Yang Hyong Sop meets Indonesian ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop meets Indonesian ambassador
    Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK Buchari Effendi who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
